item.title: alpha
item.description: × ALPHA HD Wallpaper ❮ ❯ Alpha is another creation of Laboratory 1718 after Saber left. Mad scientists got a new idea from a famous sci-fi movie. Using human bodies as biological material and space meteorolite as metal skeletons, they created powerful twins. Alpha and Beta, also known as 'Flesh Weapon', are capable of utilizing a supernatural power that's ubiquitous but very mystery. However, the twins had always had a strong conscience, and refused to become killing machines.
